Html:
I have interested in WPF toolkit, I want to use it in my commercial project. Can I do that?

Thanks,
Ek

Hi Ek, yes, the Toolkit is licenses under the Microsoft Public License (Ms-PL) which permits you to use the Toolkit in any project, commercial or otherwise.Â  Please see the License tab for the details of the license: http://wpf.codeplex.com/license

Thanks,
Samantha
